ai-tha-ap28:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap28:1.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap28:2.4_0: and the fruit of ten years.
ai-tha-ap28:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap28:3.4_0: and the fruit of ten years.
ai-tha-ap28:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap28:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap28:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap28:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ātumā with these verses.
ai-tha-ap28:6.1_0: a sixth part of the senior monks is a sixth part of the senior.
